name: (Pup)Pet!
description:
(Pup)Pet! - Made weekly game jam (Week 79) Theme: Puppet Master

Guide Your Puppy Puppet Safely, and Keep It Well Fed!

WASD - Move

R - Restart

The goal is to not have your line cut by the slices, while also keeping your pup well fed off dog bones (food meter is white bar across top) How long can you and your puppy last?

(For Mobile Play go to my website: http://www.gamesuburb.com/PupPet.html HTML5 on itch.io confuses me.)
